title: Meate out of the eater, or, Hopes of unity in and by divided and distracted times. Discovered in a sermon preached before the Honourable house of Commons at Margarets Westminster on their solemne day of fast, June 30. 1647. / By Tho: Manton Minister of Stoke-Newington.
author: Manton, Thomas, 1620-1677.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by M.S. for Hanna Allen at the Crowne in Popes-head Alley,
